column3: Meryld's ever-watchful gaze is upon you, with a smile uncomfortably reminiscent of Tataru writ across her face.
Speak with the House Leveilleur maidservant.
<If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>, it is a pleasant surprise to see you. As ever, your timing is impeccable.
Lady Ameliance has entrusted me with a gift for you─a set of attire she hoped would be to your liking.

Before relinquishing the clothing to you, I thought it prudent to make sure they are a proper fit. I am terribly sorry for the inconvenience, but may I trouble you to speak with the maidservant yonder?
The gift is, of course, a token of Lady Ameliance's appreciation for your deeds─but I should hope you will accept it as a sign of thanks from we servants as well.
And if I may say one more thing...please continue to look after Master Alphinaud and Lady Alisaie.
Please seek out the maidservant for any necessary adjustments to the clothing when you have a moment.
Greetings, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>Madam<Else/>Master</If> <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,2)/>. I have your attire here.
Lady Ameliance has a sharp eye for measurements, but please allow me to confirm no other adjustments are needed.
Hmmm...yes, the shoulders should fit nicely...and the length of the sleeves should not prove to be an issue either.
With that, I believe I have taken up quite enough of your time. On behalf of all the staff here at House Leveilleur, I wish you safe travels!
